revision.comment: /* top */ clean up, replaced: hynix → SK hynix (2), SK SK hynix → SK hynix (2)
revision.text:
{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = |image1_size = |caption = UniFi AP 11AC (UAP-AC) |caption2 = |pp = https://www.ui.com/unifi/unifi-ac/ |sp = |dl = |wikidevi = |wikipedia = |ddwrtsupport = |openwrtsupport = |tomatosupport = |gargoylesupport = |brand = Ubiquiti Networks |model = UniFi AP 6 |submodelappend = yes |submodel = AC |revision = |subrevision = |model_part_num = UAP-AC |wlclass = AC1750 |series = |type = access point |sernum = |fcc_id = SWX-UAPAC |icid = 6545A-UAPAC |us_id = |boardid = |ecc_id = |cpu1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM4706; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS 74K |cpu1_type_rev = |cpu1spd = 600 |is_doc = |bus = 8-bit |flash1type = |fla1_num = |fla1chip = Winbond;W25Q128FVFG; |flash1size = 16 |flash1maxsize = |ram1type = |ram1type1 = |ram1spd = |ram1size = 256 |ram1chip = SK hynix;H5PS1G63JFR; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = |eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Broadcom;BCM53125; |lan_ports = 2 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = |portbasedvlan = |802.1qvlan = |auto_mdix = |sup_jumbo = |ethoui = |oui = |bootwait = |stockbootloader = |stockos = |exp_if_types = Mini PCIe |exp_sim_num = |exp_pcmcia_num = |exp_expcard_num = |exp_minipci_num = |exp_minipcie_num = 2 |exp_usb_num = |exp_cf_num = |exp_sdmmc_num = |exp_ide_num = |exp_ata_num = |exp_sata_num = |exp_esata_num = |exp_parallel = |exp_sfp_num = |exp_M.2 = |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = |pwr_volt_type = POE |pwr_poe_type = af |pwr_poe = 48 |pwr_poe_amp = 0.5 |pwr_conn = Ethernet (PoE) |serial = |jtag = |specialfeat = |flags = enterprise class, high power, |addchip = |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac |defaulip = |defaultlogin = |defaultpass = |defaultssid = |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = |manuf = |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 04/08/2013 |estreldate = 04/2013 |estprice = 299 |upc = 609722639125 |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = B00D80J2XU |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = |wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = Broadcom BCM94360MC |rad1modif = Mini PCIe (oversized) |rad1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM4360; |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 3 |rad1rxchains = 3 |rad1sstreams = 3 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |acqam1 = |rad1ac = 1300 |rad1n = 450 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 5 |rad1correv = |rad1cap = |wi2_if_name = |rad2mod = Broadcom BCM94331MC |rad2modif = Mini PCIe (oversized) |rad2chip1 = Broadcom;BCM4331; |rad2oui = |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL |rad2txchains = 3 |rad2rxchains = 3 |rad2sstreams = 3 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |nqam2 = |rad2n = 450 |rad2g = 54 |rad2b = 11 |rad2freq = 2.4 |rad2correv = |rad2cap = }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== The device is referred to as the '''UniFi AP 11AC (UAP-AC)''' on the product page. *[http://dl.ubnt.com/marketing/unifi/Ubiquiti_PR_UniFi_3.pdf '''UBNT''' press release (pdf)] Per the FCC docs... *The FCCID SWX-UAPAC also covers the '''UAP-AC Outdoor'''. *"UAP-AC-PRO" is silkscreened on the main board. :"11-00298-01" appears to be underneath the silkscreened text. :"11-00300-03" appears to be on the 2.4GHz module. :"11-00785-04" appears to be on the 5GHz module. *The main board and the modules also have (well, probably, :not quite readable on the main board) the '''Ubiquiti Networks''' :logo and "(C)2012" silkscreened on them. *2x ''SK hynix'' RAM chips (''maybe'' H5PS5162GFR-Y5C, for 128MB total) *Two Ethernet ports, both GbE, leftmost (with unit on it's back) :is the Main+PoE (LAN) port, rightmost is Secondary port.. *The device is presumably using BCM4360 (w/ ''[[Skyworks]]'' FEMs) :+ [[Broadcom]] BCM4331/BCM43431.. ==Links of Interest== ===Reviews=== *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/32153-ubiquiti-uap-ac-access-point-reviewed ''Ubiquiti UniFi AP AC'' Review on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] :Specific P/N information is per '''SNB'''. The device is stated to be Wi-Fi certified. :This may be the module only ([http://certifications.wi-fi.org/pdf_certificate.php?cid=WFA20013 BCM94360MC]?). *[http://www.anandtech.com/show/6856/ubiquiti-networks-brings-80211ac-to-enterprise-wifi-aps ''Ubiquiti Networks bring 802.11ac to Enterprise Wi-Fi APs'' on '''AnandTech'''] :[http://community.ubnt.com/t5/UniFi/New-Unifi-Hardware/td-p/410469 One thread about the device on the '''UBNT''' forums] *[http://www.ubnt.com/announcing-unifi-3 ''Announcing UniFi 3.0 802.11ac AP'' - on '''UBNT'''s site] :[http://www.ubnt.com/announcing-unifi-3 Trade in an ''Aruba Networks'' or ''Ruckus Wireless'' AP for a new UniFi 802.11ac AP] *[https://www.ixbt.com/comm/ubiquiti-unifi.shtml ''Ubiquiti UniFi AP'' on '''iXBT'''] • [https://www.ixbt.com/nw/ubiquiti-unifi-uap-ac-pro-review.html ''Ubiquiti UniFi AP AC PRO'' on '''iXBT'''] (RU) ==See also== ===Models=== :;[https://www.ui.com/products/#unifi Ubiquiti UniFi Products] • [https://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/ubiquiti/unifiac ''Ubiquiti UniFi AP AC'' on '''OpenWrt''' wiki] *[[Ubiquiti Networks UniFi AP AC (UAP-AC)]] • [https://www.ubnt.com/unifi/unifi-ap-ac/ PPage] *[[Ubiquiti Networks UniFi AP AC LITE]] (UAP-AC-LITE) • [https://www.ubnt.com/unifi/unifi-ap-ac-lite/ PPage] :CPU: [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9563-AL3A @775MHz :Flash: ''Macronix'' MX25L12835FMI (16MB) :RAM: [[Winbond]] W971GG6KB-25 (128MB) *[[Ubiquiti Networks UniFi AP AC LR]] (UAP-AC-LR) • [https://www.ubnt.com/unifi/unifi-ap-ac-lr/ PPage] *[[Ubiquiti Networks UniFi AP AC PRO]] (UAP-AC-PRO) • [https://www.ubnt.com/unifi/unifi-ap-ac-pro/ PPage] *[[Ubiquiti Networks UniFi AP AC EDU]] (UAP-AC-EDU) • [https://www.ubnt.com/unifi/unifi-ap-ac-edu/ PPage] *[[Ubiquiti Networks UniFi AP AC HD]] (UAP-AC-HD) • [https://unifi-hd.ubnt.com/ PPage] *[[Ubiquiti Networks UniFi AP AC Mesh]] (UAP-AC-Mesh) • [https://unifi-mesh.ubnt.com/ PPage] *[[Ubiquiti Networks UniFi AP AC Mesh PRO]] (UAP-AC-Mesh-PRO) • [https://unifi-mesh.ubnt.com/ PPage] *[[Ubiquiti Networks UniFi AP In-Wall]] (UAP-In-Wall) • [https://www.ubnt.com/unifi/unifi-ap-wall/ PPage] ====Model Comparison==== '''
Model		UAP-AC-LITE	UAP-AC-LR	UAP-AC-PRO	UAP-AC-EDU	UAP‑AC‑HD

CPU Chip	QCA9563		QCA9563		QCA9563		QCA9563        	IPQ806x
Flash/RAM	16/128 MB	16/128 MB	16/128 MB	16/128 MB	32/512 MB
2.4GHz Chip	QCA9563		QCA9563		QCA9563		QCA9563	        QCA9994
2.4GHz Speed	300 Mbps	450 Mbps	450 Mbps	450 Mbps	800 Mbps
5GHz Chip	QCA9888		QCA9882		QCA9880		QCA9880		QCA9994
DFS Monitor?                                                                    QCA9889
5GHz Speed	867 Mbps	867 Mbps	1300 Mbps	1300 Mbps	1733 Mbps
Eth PHY		AR8033		AR8033		QCA8334		AR8033		QCA8033 x2
Ports		1x GbE		1x GbE		2x GbE		1x GbE		2x GbE
PoE Mode	24V Pass PoE	24V Pass PoE	802.3af/at PoE+	802.3at PoE+ 	802.3at PoE+
Dimensions	∅160x32 mm	∅176x43 mm	∅197x35 mm	∅288x126 mm	∅220x48 mm
Environment	Indoor		Indoor		Indoor/Outdoor	Indoor		Indoor/Outdoor
''' [[Category:English Documentation]]
